page.title: 08LANIVET TRADE cont.
page.content:
The Garage and Shop. Here we have a very important service industry that of the petrol station. As in many areas, the garage incorporates a shop. They sell a very wide range of commodities ranging from car accessories, sweets and icecream to fresh bread and bottled milk.
Lanivet Motors. This establishment provides a service to the motorist.On the premises there is a fulltime mechanic, a shop that sells spare parts and an agency that sells Japanese cars in the U.K.
The village of Lanivet also has the services provided by the Post Office, a public house and two fish and chip shops.
